high_descs: Turn right and then right again to face the table with the box on it.
Pick the box up from the table.
Go right and face the white table to the right of the couch with a lamp on it.
Turn the lamp on the table on.
anns.task_desc: Pick a box up and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Walk forward to the blue chair, then turn right and walk forward to the coffee table in the center of the room.
Pick up the empty box from the coffee table.
Turn right and walk forward to the lamp on the small table by the blue chair.
anns.task_desc: Examine an empty box by the light of a table lamp.

high_descs: walk forward, turn right, walk between couch and coffee table, turn right to face coffee table
pick up the box that is on the coffee table
turn right, take a step, turn left, take a step, turn right, walk to small table with lamp on it
anns.task_desc: examine a box with a lamp
